data.name: HSBC Bonus Savings Account- CAD
data.description: Build your foreign currency savings with the benefit of easy access to your money via branch, phone, internet or mobile banking.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Minors aged 12 can apply account in joint name with parent/guardian. Minors aged 16 years or older can apply in own name
You must have an Australian residential address.
HSBC Bonus Savings account is available for trust account, including SMSF and Non- Trading Entity. Trust accounts are only available via Branch / Contact Centre. Not available via HSBC Website.

fees.name: International Transfer from a bank to your HSBC account
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies to receiving payment into the account in AUD, a foreign currency or a currency different to your account

fees.name: Transfer from a local bank to your HSBC account in a foreign currency
Real Time Gross Settlement Transfer (RTGS) from a local bank to your HSBC account in AUD
Foreign currency cheques/drafts issued by a bank and paid into your HSBC account
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies to receiving payment into the account in AUD, the same foreign currency or a different foreign currency

fees.name: International Transfer made via HSBC Branch
fees.additionalInfo: You can choose to pay a Correspondent Bank Cover Fee of AUD30, and we will cover the intermediary/correspondent bank charges.If you do not wish to pay the Correspondent Bank Cover Fee, you can have the intermediary/correspondent bank fees charged to the recipient. This means the amount the payee receives will be less than the amount you send as any intermediary/correspondent bank fees will be automatically deducted.

fees.name: International Transfer made via Online Banking
fees.additionalInfo: You can choose to pay a Correspondent Bank Cover Fee of AUD30, and we will cover the intermediary/correspondent bank charges.If you do not wish to pay the Correspondent Bank Cover Fee, you can have the intermediary/correspondent bank fees charged to the recipient. This means the amount the payee receives will be less than the amount you send as any intermediary/correspondent bank fees will be automatically deducted.

fees.name: International Transfer made via Mobile Banking
fees.additionalInfo: Correspondent/intermediary bank charges may not apply for some International Transfers. This is dependent on the receiving country or region, and the currency of payment. If correspondent/intermediary bank charges do not apply, no Correspondent Bank Cover Fee will be charge

fees.name: Local Transfer in AUD via Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS) made via HSBC Branch
Local Transfer in AUD via Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS) made Online Banking
Local Transfer in AUD via Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS) made Mobile Banking
Local Transfer in AUD from AUD account made via HSBC Branch
Local Transfer in AUD from AUD account made via Online Banking
Local Transfer in AUD from AUD account made via Mobile Banking
Local Transfer in AUD from foreign currency account made via HSBC Branch
Local Transfer in AUD from foreign currency account made via Online Banking
Local Transfer AUD from foreign currency account made via Mobile Banking
Local Transfer in foreign currency from AUD or foreign currency account made via HSBC Branch
Local Transfer in foreign currency from AUD or foreign currency account made via Online Banking
Local Transfer in foreign currency from AUD or foreign currency account made via Mobile Banking
Correspondent Bank Cover Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee may apply to cover all intermediary correspondent bank changes for international and local transfers. The intermediary/correspondent and receiving bank may also impose additional charges. When sending money via mobile banking, this fee will be shown in the mobile banking app payment journey the instances where applicable.

fees.name: Global Transfer in AUD from your account with us to an HSBC Group member
fees.additionalInfo: Global Transfers are only available through our online banking service to customers of participating HSBC Group member jurisdictions.

discounts.description: HSBC Australia Premier and Global Advance Customer
discounts.additionalInfo: Global Transfer fee does not apply for HSBC Australia Premier and Global Advance customers

eligibility.additionalInfo: Eligible HSBC Australia Premier and Global Advance customers receive discounts

fees.name: Global Transfer in foreign currency from your account with us to an HSBC Group member
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies to making a payment from the account. Global Transfers are only available through our online banking service to customers of participating HSBC Group member jurisdictions. This amount can vary, depending on what currency the transfer is made in.

discounts.description: HSBC Australia Premier and Global Advance Customer
discounts.additionalInfo: This fee applies to making a payment from the account. Global Transfers are only available through our online banking service to customers of participating HSBC Group member jurisdictions. This amount can vary, depending on what currency the transfer is made in.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Eligible HSBC Australia Premier and Global Advance customers receive discounts

fees.name: Foreign Currency Notes (Buy/Sell)
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies if we buy or sell you foreign currency notes

fees.name: Foreign Currency Notes Deposits or Withdrawals
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies if we take deposits or withdrawals of foreign currency notes

fees.name: Bank Cheque
Replacement Bank Cheque
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies to cancelling or reissuing a cheque

fees.name: Repurchase Bank Cheque
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies to cancelling a cheque only

fees.name: Stop Payment Request
When you make a cheque deposit using Bank@Post and the cheque is dishonoured
Periodical Payment Dishonour Fee
Direct Debit Dishonour Fee (Inward and Outward)
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged when the money is returned to us for any reason

fees.name: Deposit through National Australia Bank Branch
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies to transactions through National Australia Bank branches

fees.name: Cheque Cashing through National Australia Bank Branch
fees.additionalInfo: Minimum of $10.00 AUD. Fee applies to transactions through National Australia Bank branches only

fees.name: Company Search Fee
Audit or Balance Certificate for Individual or Company
Account balance paid by Bank Cheque
Account balance paid by International Transfer
International Bank Account Opening
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies to applying for your account outside of Australia

discounts.additionalInfo: International Bank Account Opening Fee is not applicable to HSBC Premier customers

eligibility.additionalInfo: Eligible HSBC Australia Premier and Global Advance customers receive discounts

depositRates.additionalInfo: To receive the Monthly Bonus, ensure the closing account balance of the month is $300 CAD  higher (excluding interest paid during the month) than the opening balance of that month.
